analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x15722773ed43df46f7dff8375d0876384586712c.sol:
	Contract RefToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x15722773ed43df46f7dff8375d0876384586712c.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x15722773ed43df46f7dff8375d0876384586712c.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
